actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing testimony by James Sourwine, and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of David Richardson v. Raymond J. Donovan, Civil Action No. 79-2053.

summary.text: Authorizes a named congressional employee to testify in the case of David Richardson v. Raymond J. Donovan. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the employee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing testimony by James Sourwine, and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of David Richardson v. Raymond J. Donovan, Civil Action No. 79-2053.
